about_the_game:
Z Ops: Deadzone - Demo

Step into Z Ops: Deadzone, an intense first-person shooter (FPS) zombie game set in a post-apocalyptic world ravaged by Bane-Z parasites, turning humans into deadly creatures. This exclusive demo offers a glimpse into the brutal combat and survival challenges awaiting you in the full game.

Warning

Please note that this demo is a very early version of the game. It has been designed to allow you to discover the gameplay mechanics and the universe of Z Ops: Deadzone. Your feedback is crucial in helping us improve the gaming experience before the official launch. We encourage you to share your impressions, suggestions, and ideas to shape the future development of the game. Be one of the first to explore the horrors of Volygrad and uncover the secrets of this devastated world! Join our community on Discord and share your experiences with other survivors. We are committed to providing regular updates and keeping you informed of the development progress, incorporating your feedback at every step.

Demo Roadmap

Version 0.0.1 - "Gear up and dive into Volygrad, the battle is about to begin!"

  • Weapons: The GZ-8 and ZAR-1 will be available from the start, ready to take on the first hordes of zombies.

  • Map: A portion of the first raid map, Volygrad, will be playable, offering your first steps into hostile territory.

  • Shop: A portion of the shop will be accessible, allowing you to purchase ammunition and health items, as well as sell resources.

Version 0.0.2 - "Prepare the colony and face more ferocious zombies than ever before!"

  • Weapons: The P9, a new weapon, will be added with new animations, making combat even more immersive.

  • Zombies: Replacement of old zombie models with new ones that fit the game’s lore.

  • Map: Overhaul of the map and 3D models of Volygrad to enhance the visual and immersive experience.

  • Colony: Overhaul of the 3D models in the colony to strengthen immersion.

  • Gameplay: Introduction of a stamina system, adding a new layer of strategy to your movement and combat.

Version 0.0.3 - "Embark on an intense mission, every shot will count!"

  • Weapons: New models for the ZAR-1, along with updated animations to improve combat efficiency.

  • Zombies: A new classic zombie model will be added to keep the tension high.

  • Mission: A portion of a main mission will be playable on its own map, plunging you into the narrative action.

  • Colony: Addition of a room with personal storage to manage your resources and loot.

  • Side Quest: A side quest will be accessible in the colony, offering new interactions and challenges for players.

What to Expect in the Full Version:

  • New types of zombies.

  • More main missions and side quests, as well as additional raid maps for more dangerous explorations.

  • Interactive factions and expanded customization options.

  • A richer experience with frequent updates based on player feedback.

content_descriptors.notes: Z Ops: Deadzone includes scenes of intense violence and gore. Players will witness zombies devouring humans, blood splatter, and other graphic depictions of severe injuries, such as throat wounds. The game also features survival themes in a post-apocalyptic setting with moments of extreme tension. There is no sexual content or references to sexual assault, drug or alcohol abuse, or self-harm in this game.

name: Z Ops: DeadZone - Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel i5-2500 @2,7 Ghz / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 2 Go / AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel i5 4570 @ 3,2 Ghz / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 4 Go / AMD Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX

short_description: Z Ops: Deadzone is an intense FPS zombie game where you face deadly hordes in a post-apocalyptic world. Explore ruined areas, gather resources, and defend your colony against zombies infected by the Bane-Z parasite.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish
